arabic_text: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ
translation: Your creation and resurrection is only like that of a single soul[10]. Indeed, Allah is All-Hearing, All Seeing.
footnotes: [10] The creation and resurrection of all of you are as easy to Allah as that of a single soul.
